website_summaries.verdict: A simple display case that puts the main focus on the interior contents. Good option as a starter piece or for tighter spaces.
pros: Great viewing angles all the way around the display case
Easy to access and change the interior contents whenever you want
cons: Display case can be flimsy under heavy weight

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelf but risky shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf turned out pretty great, its pleasing to the eye and really sturdy even after some of the cheap plastic pieces came a little broken such as the plastic legs and plastic bars, but I determined that the shelf would be safe to build which it turned out pretty nice. I can only blame the shipping company (ups) for pieces coming a little broken, its the only risk you have to take otherwise the shelf is almost perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hal V

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cabinet. I put the stick lights inon it and it's awesome for all my videogame statues! I'm going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Barick

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome cabinet! Fast shipping and everything arrived protected. Yes it is really heavy. The instructions however are horrible and the parts/tools are not even numbered so assembly took a while to figure out. I personally installed LED lights to make mine unique. As pictured I used this for my die cast collection, cars are pretty heavy so shelves are very durable. Overall very durable and will be buying another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this display case in hopes of having an enclosure for my collectibles, mainly the fact that it had a front facing door to keep dust away. Unfortunately the build quality is absolutely horrendous, the instruction manual was awful to slog through due to none of the pieces being labeled with numbers or letters when there was pieces that are multiple different sizes. The hinges that came with it were about half a size too small and I was unable to attach the door because of this basically making the whole point of the display case useless for me. Pay the extra money to get something of better quality. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Has many scratches~ other than that, Nice display Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this Display cabinet five stars. As in you can see in my images, the cabinet is beautiful, and my action figures look great in it. The cabinet is very easy to put together, took me about 30 mins, just one person can get the job easily done. However, the cabinet glasses all have many scratches. I wouldn't mind Side or back glasses having scratches, but the door is in the front for people to see....I think they could definitely improve on packaging. The item arrived with minimal packaging. Just a piece of paper between all the glasses. I'm surprised that they arrived intact. So I guess, they must have used very good glasses, shatter-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Wen Hui

customer_reviews.title: They seem happy with their 20 year reputation
customer_reviews.text: This item may be ok but I will never know. Contacting the company for one broken part has been impossible. I have left them 2 messages in the last month and have heard nothing back. All I want is a replacement piece. They seem happy with their 20 year reputation. I don't know how. I am extremely angry that such a large company has no regard for their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of ****, hinges and screws NO where long enough to hold glass. Yep you guessed it, 1st day door falls and shatters. Now I am going to either buy another piece of glass, kinda scared to touch it. Plywood corner chipped right out of box, China made, SMH !! Never again !!!!
customer_reviews.author: racer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet, assembly a little tough.
customer_reviews.text: Our first shipment arrived damaged, broken glass filled the packaging and it was too heavy for us to manage the return. Thankfully Amazon's customer service saved the day, scheduled a pickup for the return and had a replacement at our door the next day. The cabinet looks great, only downgraded to 4 stars because the assembly was a pain. The instructions aren't well-written, tiny pictures made it tough for my husband to see and follow the diagrams. Two of the bolts stripped during the assembly and had to be MacGyvered into place. Now that it's complete, it makes a great display for our collection of figurines.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Coaster USA is hard to deal with. I am in need of replacement parts and I have to prove I purchased the product through Amazon however they won't accept the invoice as proof..., what else is there besides an order number that they won't take ?! Frustrated!!! I have all this glass and new top or bottom or shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this cabinet for my collection of Amiibo's. The size is perfect for small apartments and assembly is easy. I was able to assemble it myself but I highly recommend you have a second person assisting. It's very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy S

customer_reviews.title: Don't put this cabinet where there is any traffic unless you like to dust your curios often
customer_reviews.text: Instructions incomplete and poorly written. One shelf support was warped. 16 bolts were too short to work, implying no QC. Several recessed bolt receptacles were defective. Gaps: Vertical gaps in front on either side and between the front doors. Don't put this cabinet where there is any traffic unless you like to dust your curios often. More gaps: Behind all the shelves is a 1.5 inch gap across the back. In front of all the shelves there is a 2 inch gap between the shelves and the doors. Don't put in small things if you live in California (earthquakes) or they'll all be friends on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: LarrB

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Confusing
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged, but the product is so well packaged it was all safe. However, putting this together is definitely a 2 person job. The instructions are hard to follow. Also. I'd recommend putting the little shelf holders on before putting the glass in, because it's hard to reach all over and screw them in just right. Nevertheless, it is very sturdy when assembled and displays beautifully (pictured below with doors open). One last note, the package is about 120 pounds and long, so make sure you have 2 strong people to lug it in to your house. Living on the 3rd story, it was hell moving it up 3 flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny666

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The very heavy box arrived when expected. I was surprised the well packed glass was intact. I assembled the unit by myself, taking about an hour. I think it looks nice and is just what I was looking for. I would have given 5 stars, but the wooden rails bow about 1/2 inch on one side, indicating one of the rails is probably slightly longer than the other 3 rails. Still, I'm the only one who would notice this and it doesn't affect the shelves at all. The doors fit and work very good. It looks like the price went up after my purchase, so I think I got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: M. HALSEY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, sturdy curio at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this cabinet. It's so beautiful you have to see it. We did have a little trouble getting the side panels to fit with the top, but a little pressure and it all fit together. Our knicknacks & crystal are displayed and look great. It also matches our decor, and we secured it to the wall with the included screws. Very sturdy, functional and gorgeous! Great price, and fast delivery as well. I highly recommend. I'm thinking of getting the little lights to put inside the top to display the crystal better. During the day, when the sun hits them, it's spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hanford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and look fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I remove one star because of the assembly really requires two people or you need to know how to use C clamps in order to install the glass without it falling over or you could place it horizontally on the floor then I would worry about standing it up. I recommend you have a rubber mallet to help with installing the glass into the trim that hold the glass up. After buying one of these units and struggling with the first assembly I ended up buying three more and they were much easier to assemble as I went along they look great in my opinion. I installed the LED light strips. They DO NOT come with the shelving unit.
customer_reviews.author: CRoth57

customer_reviews.title: but my boyfriend and I were able to put it together in like 30-40 mins with minimal problems
customer_reviews.text: Our first curio cab arrived damaged. I sent pics and they picked up the damaged one and sent out a new one which arrived prefect. Assembly is a little of a pain, but my boyfriend and I were able to put it together in like 30-40 mins with minimal problems. We did put a piece on wrong and had to take it apart and put it back together, but that was our fault. It's a nice cabinet just wish it was more sealed and didn't have gaps in the glass by the door, and I wish the shelving was adjustable, but for $200.00 it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Phillips

customer_reviews.title: A robust display cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was exactly what I needed. It's a good design, with an easy-to open door that shuts firmly with a magnet. Since all 4 sides and the shelves are glass, the items inside are clearly visible. The glass seems strong and durable. When assembled and filled with curios, there is no hint of any instability that might lead to a tip-over. The instructions were in pictograms only. However, by studying them carefully before undertaking each step, everything became clear and obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a second one of these. Got our 1st one when we bought our house and 3 yrs later it's still in great shape. He puts all his military pride and treasures in there and I just ordered one for my old unique cameras (I'm a photographer) One bad thing is the instructions are just pictures. No words. It makes it more complicated then it really should be! And we were missing a bolt and washer in our "hard wear included" bag. Luckily we had one on hand in the garage. Also the glass shelves aren't cut the same size/shape. Some have crooked edges and slightly smaller than the other. They still fit, but not as nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Carcinogenic materials, product banned in CA
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, just as expected, but after putting it all together we noticed a warning sticker on the bottom panel stating ‘warning that the materials used in this product are known carcinogens that cause cancer and birth defects, this product is banned in the state of California because of this.’ We felt a little deceived and that this should have been clear to consumers before purchase and not hidden on the bottom panel on a small sticker. We are considering returning it, I’m very sensitive to this having just lost my mom to Cancer. Note to manufacturers please consider changing to safe materials or at least inform consumers ahead of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, but....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this to display my figures. Only reason it got 3 stars is that the instructions are “guessing” clear. You’ll put it together a few times and then notice “sh!t” that’s not the same size of the rest of the glass. I managed to put this together solo but would recommend help (I’m pretty handy). Not everything seems to line up properly. The shelves are not square to the frame and the front door seems a bit small and edges show. For what it’s meant for though I think it’s a solid buy. Just the company could put more effort into their product if they want to charge such a large ticket price
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, i have three glass cases and this is by far the wrist quality one. All the frame poles were stripped out, i got it together but it still isnt fit properly
customer_reviews.author: ravenjrob

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I got this cabinet for Xmas for my fiancé to put our LEGO collectibles in so they are away from our furry animals. When the package came it was a long thin super heavy box that happened to be open on both ends- along with the picture of the cabinet on the side. I had to show him what he was getting because I needed help carrying it in. Fair warning- it is around 80 pounds and kinda flimsy, so help with moving it is necessary! Other than that, it seemed like it was easy to put together and pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cumbersome to put together
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could be changed around a little but it takes 2 people about 2 hours grand total to put together. Like instructions should say to apply the shelf suction cups before you place longer stabilizing legs under the top and bottom pieces. It's hard to screw in the shelf suction cups when the glass is in the way. I ordered 2 of these so I was able to work out the kinks with the 2nd one. Also the boxes are so heavy with all the glass, its 2 people to move it around. But they came very well wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie M. Geater

customer_reviews.title: wrong dimentions much smaller
customer_reviews.text: First off the dimentions are wrong it's not 16,7" x 16'7" the depth is only 14" outside, the inside dimentions even smaller. The shelves are tiny 15" x 9,5". Well everything is much smaller than was expected. There is only 10" between shelves. Some people were saying the distance was 12" but it can't be true since the cabinet itself only 33" tall outside but Inside it's only 31,5". It's not bad if your figures will fit but still highly overpriced for how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya H.

customer_reviews.title: Having two people is helpful
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice cabinets. They are pretty heavy to move, when you first get the box, so having a second person is helpful, and also for assembly. Pay close attention, when attaching the long plastic strips to the back glass. They can be put on in two different orientations. I didn’t realize that at first! After they are together, they are pretty nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kent R

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Husband put it together. Said it took more time than he thought it would. The only compliant I can stress is in the very top where the screws go in the company does not supply anything to cover over the holes which makes this item look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Strickland

customer_reviews.title: it looks good and I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: When it was finally assembled, it looks good and I'm happy with it, but I there were a few problems. The assembly instructions are terrible. We ended up ditching the plastic pieces that attached three of the glass panes together because they wouldn't fit into the grooves on the top and bottom wooden panels. And there were no covers for the top of the cabinet to cover up the bolts, so it looks unfinished. I found some round black stickers and it's okay, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Grace du Ciel

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Dang this thing's heavy. How the UPS guy wrestled it is a mystery. The assembly instructions - not a complicated item it has to be noted - are pretty much useless and contain errors. The three large, heavy glass panels are a bear to hold and slot into the base and top - not a job to do by yourself, Def help needed. The four supports aren't very well secured and you have to be careful not to over tighten the fixing screws. The back panel glass is a touch too narrow to engage in the plastic strips which hold the sides in place, too. In the 21st century there are no reasons for this type of sloppiness.
customer_reviews.author: Redwagen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together so I highly recommend two people to assemble. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the shelves are not adjustable. I had some things to display that were too large and didn't want to lose an entire shelf so I had to use L-brackets and a little ingenuity to make it work. If they simply drilled additional holes into the frame then they could make all of the shelves adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: tourniquet_fan

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: I had a bunch of scratches on the glasses, and as i ignored the first one as we were putting it together we kept seeing more and more scratches and i am very u happy i wish there was a way to contact the seller !
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product like the plague!
customer_reviews.text: Not only the building quality of the pieces I got was terrible but the cabinet arrived with missing half of the parts. The return process was complicated having to contact Coaster and Amazon Multiple times and has to pay to UPS for the return, even after ordered the special warranty. Avoid this product like the plague
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Balda

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing some disappointing imported user-assembled furniture over the years, this cabinet was a pleasant surprise. It arrived intact, was well packaged, was easily assembled, and is more than adequate for it's intended purpose and attractive to boot. Only reason it didn't get five stars was because the instructions are pretty poor and the grooves cut into the base and top into which the glass slides are left in bare wood rather than painted black to match the rest of the piece. Not overly noticable when assembled but a detail that if addressed would make the product better. I will buy another if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: no one

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great In My VideoGame Room
customer_reviews.text: Packed very good for shipping. Assembley was easy. The doors are the most difficult, but not impossible. One part of instructions tells you to use Allen Wrench but actually is a Phillips head. Recommend 2 person assembley, but I actually did it by myself. The door attachment would be the most helpful with 2 people. Finished product looks great. Actually using the door handles is the worst, they move. But not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnysgames

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: After unwrapping the extremely well packaged box for 20 minutes I came to find out that there were parts missing, specifically the 2 plastic strips that hold the back glass to the side glass. As i founf out thes are the 2 pieces that create the stability for the whole case. I had already completely destroyed the package just to open and get everything out. there was no way I was going to be able to repackage it to send it back. I assembled it anyways and I now have a wobbly glass display case that cant really be touched. I will be purchasing another better one and tossing this out. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: 3/16" thick shelves bowing with less than 10 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: These shelving units look great, and were not too difficult to assemble. However, I bought these because the description says each shelf can hold 28 lbs., but when I placed one item that weighed less than 10 lbs, the shelf visibly bowed. There is no way I believe that these shelves would hold up for long with any weight on them. I will need to find a way to reinforce the shelves or replace them with wood.
customer_reviews.author: J. A Cole

customer_reviews.title: High quality tempered and beveled glass.
customer_reviews.text: Fully tempered, beveled glass. I was going to make my own cabinet and contacted a local glass cutting store for an estimate. Glass of this quality was going to cost around $300, so this was an extremely inexpensive alternative. Yes, the wood in the frame is cheap, pressed board, but the glass is beautiful and well worth the price. After seeing mine, my wife made me order one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Webb

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made particle board.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made: particle board the inserts the screws are supposed to screw into fall out while you screw. I kept product because too much to a hassle but not worth more than $50.00. I do fear the shelves are going to fall breaking a lot of the stuff I am trying to show off. This will not go with me on my next move
customer_reviews.author: ronny

customer_reviews.title: This display case is beautiful once up and filled but buying this item and ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn't give the item five stars was because one of the four black plastic vertical shelf supports had two circular pressed marks on it. I was able to move it to the rear and facing the wall. Another support had one end that couldn't be tightened at all. Fixable with a little bit of glue. This display case is beautiful once up and filled but buying this item and at this price, one shouldn't have to glue or hide unsightly qualty control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great piece and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece. Perfect for displaying my silvers. I'm a woman and was able to set this up in 1.5 hrs by myself. The trick is when it's time for you to put the glass wall on, assemble the glass on the floor first by popping the glass wall into the plastic grooves, creating the three walls of the cabinet. After that, very carefully lift it upright and slide the wooden frame underneath. If you don't do that, it's almost impossible to get the glass into plastic grooves standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: Home shopper

customer_reviews.title: I normally have good luck with Amazon recommendations/choices but not this time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Extremely heavy you really need two (2) people move and put together. Directions were vague and panels of glass held in by plastic pieces. You really need to make sure glass panels fit into otherwise cabinet off. Plastic is junk, wood elements look cheap and glass very heavy. After I put it together it looked cheap and it it a piece of junk. I normally have good luck with Amazon recommendations/choices but not this time. Take your time and read all reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee Riley

customer_reviews.title: I like them but.....
customer_reviews.text: I think these are overpriced but they look nice. I was in IKEA this past weekend and saw nearly the same display cabinet for $59. They weren't as tall but.......come on guys! I can't say I regret it because they serve their purpose and look good. I bought two for my movie room. The first one obviously took longer to put together than the second.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is kind of cheaply made hence the price. Mine came with 2 of the glass pieces scratched. Happened to be the big back piece also. Not worth returning so I hid the scratches toward the bottom. Somewhat easy to assemble. It's not very big. I thought it was much wider based on the picture. I am going to need a second one or replace with one that is twice the size. Extremely heavy and awkward packaging to bring into the house by myself. Box was left outside in a couple days of rain and product was unaffected by weather so that was cool. If you want a cheap and small curio this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D Gizicki

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cabinet with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Assembly: The slots of plastic bars (D) are too tight for side glass (B), but are relative loose for back glass (C). If you follow the instruction, you may have trouble to insert B. If that happen, try to assemble B priority to C. Height of each shelf (approximately): Top: 11 13.5/16 inch (30.1 cm) 3 of middle: 12 2.5/16 inch (30.9 cm) Bottom: 12 8.5/16 inch (31.8 cm) The only drawback is that the black paint is easily scratched off. Be careful when assembling and using. The curio cabinet is not equipped with lights, but it’s not hard to DIY your own illumination system and it could be wonderful! Overall, I’m content with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to house some vintage trains that have been passed down through my family. I followed the instructions and was able to put it together myself without to many issues. It came very well packaged, and that alone probably saved the glass to mine, as the box had been beaten up a bit. My only complaint is that the metal bits that clamp onto the magnet do move freely unless you glue them down. Other than that it looks great and does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Alright so the case is nice and all. I do own 2 of them and my only real complaint is that the shelves are not adjustable. If they were i would give it 5 stars but that makes me deduct 1 star. And i do have one suggestion, put the shelf "brackets" on first. They say do that after the glass is installed and it's a pain in the ass if you do it that way.
customer_reviews.author: David Stark

customer_reviews.title: Simple fix for screw holes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this display cabinet. You can't beat the quality of this curio for the price. The most consistent complaint is that the top looks unfinished due to uncovered screw holes on the top . It was a simple fix. I cut small circles of heavy felt and set them in the holes to give it the finished look that it needed. The curio looks amazing now and I couldn't be more pleased. The curio is the focal point of my entry way. I highly recommend this curio.
customer_reviews.author: theden

customer_reviews.title: Requires extensive assembly
customer_reviews.text: It took me two orders to get the product without damage. The unit is over 100lb’s and is not packaged will. The first one I received had mostly broken glass in it and I was required to send it back. Ridiculous.... it also requires extensive assembly and it is helpful to have two people involved. The finished product is great but I would not order another one due to the packaging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is flimsy. I had a hard time putting it together. Purchased another because needed it to match. I bought a box of busted glass. Took forever to fight for a refund and finally Amazon stepped in.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H aka Batman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet and looks more expensive than it was. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and gorgeous came a day earlier than expected. All pieces were undamaged and wrapped very well for shipment. Only one thing would make it better, and that’s if it had lights. We don’t need the lighting, as we placed it in a well lit area. Shelves are roomy and well spaced for taller items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes up into a sturdy handsome piece!
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am happy with this unit. It was slightly damaged in shipment. A small area of the black melamine sheet separated on the edge. It was an easy fix after playing around with it. I think it took a hit on the edge during shipment. The packaging was inundated with a fine Styrofoam dust coating everything. Vacuumed everything off and was good to go. Assembly went smoothly with the help of a small quick clamp to hold the glass against the frames. Make sure your clamps have soft jaws to keep from scratching anything. Makes up into a sturdy handsome piece that looks nice in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and inexpensive curio cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is an avid collector of elephant figurines of various sizes and made of materials ranging from wood to marble and bronze. These started cluttering our counters. So, I started looking for a curio cabinet that can fit in the niche under our staircase that has been empty. The Coaster Home Furnishings 950179 curio cabinet has the exact height and half the width of the niche under our staircase. So, I bought two of these and set them side by side. Now our elephant figurines sit nicely inside these cabinets and we got quite a few compliments from our friends. We’re very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sadda Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Very unfortunate - glass came shattered
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this a 1 star is because the product came (glass) shattered... When we lift up the box we could hear all the shattered glass moving around. Opened it and pretty sad about it. The product looks great, just disappointed with the broken parts. I am sure this would have been a great cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking display cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and assembled the first one last night. Reading so many other reviews I almost didn't make the purchase as everyone said it took hours to set up; however, I spent maybe 30-40 minutes from the time I opened the box to the time I moved it to the wall. The instructions are lacking but if you have some basic mechanical skills its pretty self explanatory. All in all I think its a good purchase and I'll likely get a few more. Edit: the second unit I bought came broken . The company replaced it no cost so no complaint there. I need to buy a couple more
customer_reviews.author: M. L. King

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cabinet to show off nice items
customer_reviews.text: It was horrible assembling it. We needed 3-4 people since it is made of glass and not too sturdy base. For what you pay for it, it is nice. BUT, This is not an expensive "piece" of furniture. So after assembling, the corners and doors do not meet up exactly which lets in little puffs of dog hair if you have any fur babies running around. This item needs to be cleaned 2-3 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: jjdubious

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, Good basic display case
customer_reviews.text: This display case isn't all that fancy but It looks pretty good. For the price I paid, I feel I got a pretty good value. Not really any kind of adjustability on the shelf height or spacing but it's still a pretty good display case for the price. I would buy another one if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: A pain in the ass to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A pain in the ass to assemble but once its done, it looks great for the price. Took about 2 hrs to build it solo. Its heavy so build it where it's gonna go. Wouldn't buy it for more than $200 so wait til prices drops under $200
customer_reviews.author: Terryhaa

customer_reviews.title: Useless confusing assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions that came with this curio are the worst I have ever seen. No written instructions. You are guided with a picture diagram that doesn't tell you it's nearly impossible to do this by yourself. I was stuck with figuring it out on my own. The person who wrote these instructions should be sentenced to spending the rest of their life assembling Ikea merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Ray

customer_reviews.title: Totally elevated the room!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Took one person an hour or so to put together. The directions were clear (except you really have to look for the difference between the top and bottom board because they aren't labeled) and easy to follow. The box looked pretty bad on arrival, so I expected some broken glass, but pleasantly surprised that everything was pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne G.

customer_reviews.title: Two man Job.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is very difficult to put together alone. If you buy it make sure you have someone to work with. I attempted to assemble it by myself and discovered that this is a two man job. I tried and tried but I just couldn't do it. Ultimately I got so angry and frustrated that I just took every piece and threw it all away. So don't make the same mistake I made. Get another person to help you put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Markis

customer_reviews.title: buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: So the poor, flimsy quality of the critical uprights that hold the top and bottom together made for a nightmare in assembly. When tightening three of the 8 screw anchors pulled out. I managed to fix them but there is no excuse fo such poor construction. If it wasn't so difficult to return I would, but the enormous amount of glass would take forever to repack. My worst Amazon purchase in a long long time. And you guys said it was a bestseller.
customer_reviews.author: michael h. wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Regrets...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was ridiculous to put together. NOTHING was labeled by the letters and numbers the assembly instructions assigned them, you pretty much had to guess what glass was what or what side was top or bottom. The instructions has no words, just diagrams. Also, the glass came broken and the glass that opens in front is slanted, but it took hours to put together so I’m not taking it apart just to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: terrible construction. such a pain to put together. cheap wood, doesn't hold the screws, the plastic strip for the glass is cheap and deformed which makes sliding the glass panels in nearly impossible. if i didn't have all the pieces laid out and the box destroyed i would send this junk back so fast
customer_reviews.author: gcic420

customer_reviews.title: Revising my review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2015. Loved it so much. I moved three times very well till this last move only because the moron movers LOST the shelves. I attempted to contact the manufacturer about purchasing more shelves. They never returned my emails. Now I have a cabinet sitting empty. Trying to find shelves for this thing. I love it still but would love it more with dang shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my smaller dolls
customer_reviews.text: This curio display case is perfect for my smaller dolls. Just what I needed. My daughter and son-in-law came over and put it together for me, and had no problems with assembly. They used another reviewers notes and zipped right through it.
customer_reviews.author: bgmaw

customer_reviews.title: Case is Beautiful once put together
customer_reviews.text: Case is Beautiful once put together...but frame made out of soft wood...wood split on us when putting screws in...had to glue wood together. A bit Concerned about soft wood holding all that glass but continued to build case. Case became stronger once glass was put into it. Would be a perfect case if frame was made out of black metal instead of soft wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, All-Glass, & A Great Showcase
customer_reviews.text: It took a decent amount of time (a Saturday afternoon) for two people to assemble as there were no included instructions in the box. After it was all said and done, the final result is amazing! The all-glass design really allows the viewer to focus on the contents instead of the cabinet and the shelving lent itself to easy cleaning (glass really attacts dust). It would have been nice to have had some included lighting but those options are available for more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Stop now and buy it! This is the one you want. Get it from amazon, instructions where easy but may need 2 people because of weight of items. Looks good. The only issue I had was it was delivered by UPS and weight 125ish, and would take it out of his truck. I drove to his truck (down my driveway) loaded it in, and done.
customer_reviews.author: SINnPunishmnet

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Glass Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Assembly isn't very difficult with one exception. It is extraordinarily difficult to keep the two sides and the rear glass pieces aligned while you insert them into the upper and lower grooves to tighten everything down. You will need another person to help you as one person cannot hold everything in place by themselves. It took at least ten attempts to get everything together. It's beautiful when it's done but the glass isn't easy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Kosmerl

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was difficult to assemble only because the instructions are not very clear. Once we figured it out it went together nicely. Make sure you have the connectors for the doors screwed tightly. It looks wonderful and is just the size we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Degendorfer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a nice looking display cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It can be tricky to assemble, so take your time and be careful not to over tighten the parts or put lateral pressure on the vertical supports while assembling. That's what causes the failures described by others. And certainly have someone on hand to help you move the box to the unpacking and assembly area. It is extremely heavy. Once it's together, it looks good. I have a pair of them and they work great for displaying my vintage camera gear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Evangelist

customer_reviews.title: A very nice display case
customer_reviews.text: A very nice display case. It seems sturdy and has no wobble once assembled. Assembly is straight-forward and simple. The tolerances are a bit tight, so care must be taken to fully seat the glass sides or the top will not be even. A little wiggling of the glass panels is needed to fully seat them in the slots in the base and top. My wife loves the case. We placed a couple of stick-on cabinet lights (battery operated) underneath the top wood panel for illumination. Our unit sits on top of a buffet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful to look at. Very high quality for the price. Be sure the lay the glass flat while assembling, both for obvious reasons, and to reduce the chance that you'll bend or bow the glass. You'll need 2 people to carry the box, but it should only take one of you to assemble. I ordered two of these and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A shrine to my son.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cabinet has a place to display my son's urn and gifts from family/friends on his passing. The cabinet is sturdy and does what it is supposed to do. The assembly was a time consuming and difficult with the plastic rail supports for the glass pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick the Father

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, decent size: 4.5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Looks attractive (very nice looking, really) * displays contents well Cons: * I would have preferred a little better quality wood than particleboard (that would've made it a 5 star rating, easily, easily) * Instructions were a little small to read - but it didn't take 2 hours to assemble for me like someone mentioned - more like 45-60 mins. * Instructions could be a little clearer: e.g. 2nd last step or so they say "don't tighten the screws holding up the shelves, we'll do that later", but that's the last you hear of that! As these were glass shelves, I was a little leary of leaving glass shelves with loose supports under them. Worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: do not ever buy anything from this manufacturer -- shoddy ...
customer_reviews.text: do not ever buy anything from this manufacturer -- shoddy quality, wobbly and loose. returned after trying to assemble and realized that the flimsy construction won't survive even a mildest of earthquakes (I live in California).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yamnitsky

customer_reviews.title: Presentation is very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Direction are not helpful. Just use your own ability to look at picture and putting furniture etc. Together. It looks great Will be adding some lights. It is quite larger than was expecting from prior reviews. Love Love this case.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!  Get some help when assembling & moving.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item that looks good and seems to be very well made. A bit tricky for one person to assemble, but would be best with two people, so someone can hold the glass while the other places the top on it. It was very heavy in the box, and takes a bit of finessing to move the assembled product to a different location, so suggest two people involved when assembling & moving this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurieuhoo

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were not labeled. I could not find which part was G or D. The instructions were not clear or easy to understand because of the parts not being labeled. It takes two people to put it together. Once you figure out where each part goes, it becomes somewhat easy to put together. There should be a YouTube video on how to put the curio together or better labeled pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jody's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just go to IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are TERRIBLE. Horribly unclear, no actual text, and completely wrong in some places(I had to go online to find the correct ones, and even then there was some guess work involved. Very clunky to put together, and extremely wobbly. If you want a cabinet like this, just go to Ikea. Not only is it cheaper, but it's much, much easier to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The Plastic that holds the glasses together is horrible to attach
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product very sturdy just the plastic you use to connect the glasses is horrible to get on and I spent 2 hours and still never got it on so in turn it wabbles when my cats hit it etc very annoying but other then that good product
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: it came out nice. I use mine for my Doctor who collection
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together. After many curses and arguing with my husband during install, it came out nice. I use mine for my Doctor who collection. Even though it was hard to put together I would buy it again. It is very heavy when it arrives. Takes two people to bring in house. We carted it up stairs. long box. Be very careful when opening box. Its was packaged fine. Nothing was broken. Only problem was instructions and install.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable display stand out there!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely takes two people to put together - but not because it's difficult, just need two sets of hands to hold the sides up. 30min construction once all items are laid out. Durable, affordable, looks fantastic. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nutkracker

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Curio
customer_reviews.text: We really like this curio, though it was a bit challenging to assemble. We bought two, so the second was a lot easier. Only wish it had more holes drilled for shelf supports so that shelves could be placed at various levels. We have a couple of high pieces that made it necessary to take out a shelf to make room. Once assembled, you can't change it without taking it all apart. Forget that! We need to order a couple more, and will drill additional holes for the shelf supports prior to assembly! We think it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Very versitile
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the thrift shop where I volunteer. We needed a small jewelry display case that didn't take up alot of counter space. It is easy to arrange items and the overall display result is very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower seed

customer_reviews.title: Nice display but heavy in original packaging.  If you want to put a light in cabinet, you'll need to drill a hole in the top.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice fully assembled. Not too hard to put together but pretty heavy with all the glass in the packaging. Not any more difficult to assemble if you've put things together from IKEA before. If you want to add a display light, you'll need to drill a hole from the top and then hide the cord running down the back. I got an LED light puck from IKEA. It also came with an earthquake strap that you'll need to tap a screw in the top and drill a hole in your drywall. If you have it set up next to a wall stud, you'll need to provide your own wood screw.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Chang

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I am the type of person who will fall down just standing up, heck I will fall down while sitting on the floor, so it's safe to say I run into walls often. Well I have bumped into this case many a time and I feel it is safe to say I would break before it would... Will be buying another as my husband has already filled the one I bought him.
customer_reviews.author: gia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet actually looked better than I expected it to and was a good price. It was a bit hard to assemble and the instructions were clear as mud but once assembled it looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: llv

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was a joke
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice pain in the butt to put together need 3 people to put together.Delivery guy was a joke couldn’t find my house even though it was a mile away from him and barely spoke English.Box was damaged when picked up from him.
customer_reviews.author: Edward york

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE THREADED INSERTS TO MOUNT THE SHELVES WAS BAD. I HAD TO BUY A TAP TO CLEAN ...
customer_reviews.text: DIRECTIONS HARD TO FOLLOW ON HOW TO MOUNT THE DOORS. ONE OF THE THREADED INSERTS TO MOUNT THE SHELVES WAS BAD. I HAD TO BUY A TAP TO CLEAN UP THE THREADS SO I COULD PUT THE SCREW IN IT. ONE OF THE GLASS SHELVES WAS MISSING. I WAS SUPPOSED TO GET FOUR AND THERE WAS ONLY THREE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit for the money - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for to display Wizard of Oz memorabilia. Package arrived without the hardware package. Customer service at Coastal was great even through all the missed days over the holidays (thank you Jasmin!) Kept me informed of the status of replacement parts through email and phone. The instructions were a bit vague- pictures only - but my husband managed without much trouble I added fairy lights on a timer as a finishing touch. It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Inexpensive glass curio cabnet
customer_reviews.text: By myself installed fine beside corner, as is best place in the room to. Shout out to bigbadbangali's review instructions they did make assembly sooo much easier. Stuck brush pile by doors to ceal out dust. Thanks thisll do for my anime figure collection will do business again. (👍 ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)👍
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Except display tower
customer_reviews.text: The curio is what I needed to display our collectible statues put the glass does not fit in the plastic corner pieces evenly and the caps to cover screws on top should be plugs not tape. We built a platform to put them on and it dressed them up real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Gilson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT display case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this display case! The instructions are manageable if you just take your time and pay attention to the details (however, it didn't take me that long to finish it, and I was working by myself). Definitely set it up near where you want to put it--it is VERY heavy! When it was all finished, I absolutely loved it. It is my favorite piece in my living area now!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Naumann

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but:
customer_reviews.text: Good to display light items. Shelf weight capacity does not seem to be able to hold a lot. Assembly I thought would be fairly easy but I ended up hiring a furniture assembler at $50 to put it together. Not real easy to do it without help. If you think your treasured items are protected, you need to know that this is not air tight and you'll be dusting your items on display.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Mine was missing a self. The reason I gave it one star is that its still open enough to get dust into. Plus it looks a little cheap
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was an early Christmas gift for my husband. He collects things and wanted something simple to display them in. This fit the bill perfectly. One thing. I would not recommend this for a household with small children or rambunctious pets.
customer_reviews.author: mmin1710

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Glass
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice display. But a pain to assemble. Mine came with huge deep scratches in the door and the side glass. Be careful when putting it together, the glass will smudge and it's next to impossible to clean even with cleaners. It also scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Glass is scratch!! Have been told From CS ...
customer_reviews.text: Glass is scratch!! Have been told From CS that we need to send back the scratch door in original in pack !!! the glass door is thin and if we need to send this in it will break in more parts.. We send The pictures to the CS BIT was not enough
customer_reviews.author: Mogens

customer_reviews.title: Mostly works for me but there is a little bit concerns
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is nice, the only thing I want to complain is the instruction book, which is too confusing in some sections, but I may consider buying a second one like this
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Display case, looks great and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome, putting it together wasn’t that hard, you might need another persons help holding the glass panels. Exactly what I wanted, it was a great price, and came on time. It is kind of heavy too but that’s a good thing. I added the lights, they have remote and require no wiring. 3 AA BATTERIES. Got those off Amazon too, $20 for 4 and a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Neil P

product_meta.title: 4-Shelf Glass Curio Cabinet Black and Clear
product_meta.description: Size:16.8"x14.2"x63.7"Ideal for a more compact space, this curio cabinet offers fresh and inspiring style. Simple linear design blends a slender black frame with tempered glass shelving. Push-to-open glass doors offer easy access to its interior space. This curio cabinet is an ideal venue for showcasing treasured decor and artwork. Add it to a tasteful seating ensemble or position it as an eye-catching standalone piece.
feature_bullets: Materials: Glass, wood, pine and paper veneer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,128 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
